## Assignment 2: Analysis of Credit Scoring

### 1)

Let's import the data and have a look at it.

```{r}

set.seed(12345)
australianCrabs = read.csv("./australian-crabs.csv")
kable(head(australianCrabs), caption = "australian-crabs.csv")
ggplot(australianCrabs, aes(x = CL, y = RW, colour = sex)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```
